Durham.Gorman, North Carolina:
Gorman is a census-designated place (CDP) in Durham County, North Carolina, United States. The population was 1,011 at the 2010 census.


== Geography ==
Gorman is located in east-central Durham County at 36°2′22″N 78°49′11″W (36.039342, -78.819783), between the city of Durham to the southwest and Falls Lake on the Neuse River to the northeast.
